text: balahīnarāyi gaṇikkappeṭṭavar valuppaṁ naṭiccavarēāṭ paṟayuṁ: alla, ñaṅṅaḷ allāhuvil aviśvasikkānuṁ, avann samanmāre sthāpikkuvānuṁ niṅṅaḷ ñaṅṅaḷēāṭ kalpiccu keāṇṭirunna sandarbhattil (niṅṅaḷ) rāvuṁ pakaluṁ naṭattiya kutantrattinṟe phalamāṇat‌. śikṣa kāṇumpēāḷ avar khēdaṁ manas'sil oḷippikkuṁ. satyaniṣēdhikaḷuṭe kaḻuttukaḷil nāṁ caṅṅalakaḷ vekkukayuṁ ceyyuṁ. taṅṅaḷ pravartticcirunnatinṟe phalamallāte avarkk nalkappeṭumēā
